peer5.description:
The Peer5 P2P transport.
Requirements: HLS media source and player configuration; in-browser WebRTC support. Unsupported browsers fall back to HTTP progressive streaming.

peer5JsUrl.doc: Peer5 customer component script URL (set by the host web page, not for manual setting)
peer5JsUrl.label: peer5.js URL (do not set manually, will be overwritten)

peer5HlsjsPluginJsUrl.doc: Peer5 HLS transport component script URL (set by the host web page, not for manual setting)
peer5HlsjsPluginJsUrl.label: peer5.hlsjs.plugin.js URL (do not set manually, will be overwritten)

setupTimeout.doc: Delay the player setup by this much at worst (in milliseconds, required)
setupTimeout.label: Setup timeout (ms, required)
